channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump says he is removing Lisa Cook from the Fed board
item.description: President Trump said Monday he is removing Lisa Cook from her position as a governor on the Federal Reserve board, saying there is "sufficient reason"...

item.title: Report: Ranked-Choice Voting Would Be ‘Disastrous’ For Michigan Elections
item.description: 'RCV is only the latest potentially misguided proposal threatening to transform our election system for the worse.'

item.title: Trump says 15% tariffs on South Korea won't change after meeting with President Lee Jae-myung
item.description: President Trump said the U.S. trade deal with South Korea will remain in place, with 15% tariffs on South Korean goods, after meeting Monday at the Wh...

item.title: Trump expands federal anti-crime agenda, enlists more agencies for the effort
item.description: President Trump on Monday ordered the National Guard to prepare for rapid deployment to fight crime across the country and enlisted more federal agenc...

item.title: Abrego Garcia May Be Bound for Uganda Soon
item.description: It was certain that his release would be short-lived.

item.title: Slashing the Intelligence Office Workforce Is Just a Start
item.description: Creating the Office of the Director of National Intelligence was a mistake. Short of its being erased, it needs to be streamlined and reformed.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: ICE Arrests Convicted Killer, Pedophile, Traffickers, And More ‘Worst Of The Worst’
item.description: Over the weekend, ICE officers arrested some very violent people, including a criminal illegal immigrant paroled from a voluntary manslaughter sentenc...

item.title: Sorry, Not Sorry: Cracker Barrel Doubles Down On Unpopular Rebrand
item.description: After facing nearly a week-long backlash to its new soulless rebranding efforts, Cracker Barrel is doubling down on stupid. On Monday, the once-popula...

item.title: Blessing in a Box
item.description: Safe-haven baby boxes offer hope to desperate mothers.

item.title: Japanese Internment: The Other 80th Anniversary to Remember
item.description: The moral and constitutional failure was not Roosevelt’s alone.

item.title: Kilmar Abrego Garcia re-arrested by ICE, judge blocks immediate deportation
item.description: ICE re-arrested Kilmar Abrego Garcia early Monday morning in preparation for a potential deportation to Uganda, but a federal judge ordered the govern...

item.title: Donald Trump’s Rules for Radicals
item.description: By threatening to call in the National Guard to Chicago, the president has picked his target, frozen it, and personalized it.

item.title: Trump signs proclamation honoring service members slain in Abbey Gate attack in Afghanistan
item.description: President Trump Monday honored U.S. military members killed in the Abbey Gate disaster in Kabul, Afghanistan four years ago.

item.title: DNC Chair: Democrats Need To Stop Playing By The Rules
item.description: Cheating is not an innovative Democrat strategy. It is the same old playbook.

item.title: Spanish-Speaking Abrego Garcia Doesn’t Actually Want To Be An American
item.description: We've built a system over the past few decades in which it is entirely possible to live and work without ever having to fully assimilate.
